GeomVertexFormat GeomVertexArrayFormat GeomVertexColumn GeomVertexColumn GeomVertexColumn GeomVertexArrayFormat GeomVertexColumn GeomVertexArrayFormat GeomVertexColumn GeomVertexColumn

Each GeomVertexColumn has a number of properties:

A column may have any name (though each name must be unique within a given GeomVertexFormat). If there are additional columns with names other than those in the above table, Panda will not do anything special with the columns, but it will send the vertex data to any vertex shader that requests that data by name, using the vtx_columnname parameter name. See List of Possible Shader Inputs <list-of-possible-cg-shader-inputs>.
